n = int(input())
s = input()

count = 0

for i in range(n - 2):
    if s[i] == "A" and s[i + 1] == "B" and s[i + 2] == "C":
        count += 1

print("Hello world!")
print(count)

# https://atcoder.jp/contests/abc176/tasks/abc176_a

n, x, t = map(int, input().split())

if n % x == 0:
    print(n // x * t)
else:
    print((n // x + 1) * t)
